articles.title: Letters, Nov. 1, 2025: ‘More home-schooling would help’
articles.description: Home-school After talking to several families, I have some suggestions regarding teaching and class sizes. We could greatly increase the amount of home-schooling. Families who prove they continuously home-school would receive an education allowance equal to the amount they pay for public schooling.

articles.title: Not only is Lake Powell's water level plummeting because of drought, its total capacity is shrinking, too
articles.description: Lake Powell, the second-largest human-made reservoir in the US, has lost nearly 7% of its potential storage capacity since 1963, when Glen Canyon Dam was built, a new report shows.
